actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit individuals to deduct all expenses for their medical and dental care.

summary.text: Permits individuals to deduct, under the Internal Revenue Code, all expenses for themselves and their dependents (including dependents over the age of 65) for their medical and dental care.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit individuals to deduct all expenses for their medical and dental care.
